title: Brown Butter Apple Crumble
summary: Brown Butter Apple Crumble requires around 45 minutes from start to finish. This lacto ovo vegetarian recipe serves 4 and costs 84 cents per serving. One portion of this dish contains about 3g of protein, 13g of fat, and a total of 339 calories. 7 people were impressed by this recipe. Head to the store and pick up light brown sugar, oats, salt, and a few other things to make it today. It is brought to you by Sarahs Cucina Bella. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 20%. This score is rather bad. If you like this recipe, you might also like recipes such as Brown Butter Peach Crumble Bars, Brown Butter Blackberry Crumble Bars, and Brown Butter Pear Crumble Cake.
